1.0.name: wordpress/stagtools
1.0.description:
StagTools powers your WordPress website with some regularly needed shortcodes including buttons, columns, alerts, font icons etc. It also includes several widgets and custom post types (only for Codestag Themes).

Shortcodes: Alerts, Buttons, Columns, Divider / Horizontal Ruler, Dropcaps, Intro Text, Tabs, Toggle, Font Icons by Font Awesome, Image with CSS3 filters, Videos ( supports oEmbeds )

Widgets: Twitter, Dribbble, Flickr

Custom Post Types: Portfolio, Slides, Team, Testimonials

Get Involved

If you are a developer, you can contribute to the source code on StagTools Github Repository
